mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.name, a.type, b.uid, b.rid FROM world.u_role a inner join u_user_role b on a.id=b.uid where b.uid=#{uid}
select a.id,a.url,a.name FROM world.u_permission a inner join u_role_permission b on a.id=b.pid where b.rid =(select rid from u_user_role where uid=#{uid} limit 1)
